data.title: Carlos Alazraki
data.meta_description: Carlos Alazraki Grossmann is a Mexican advertising executive. Alazraki is the founder, president, and CEO of Alazraki & Asociados Publicidad agency and the previous president of the Asociaci√≥n Mexicana de Agencias de Publicidad. He is the son of film director Benito Alazraki and son-in-law of the late Samy Yeroham, owner of Topeka. He is also the father of director Gary Alazraki.
